Keywords: Avengers , Defenders , Detective , Heroes for Hire , Marvel Knights , Midnight Sons , Mystical
Real Name: Marc Spector
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
THERE ISN'T A HIT HE WOULDN'T RATHER TAKE: When Moon Knight takes damage from an opposing character's attack, give him a Vengeance token. // At the beginning of your turn, you may remove two Vengeance tokens. If you do, modify Moon Knight's combat values +1 until your next turn.
CARVING A PATH FOR KHONSHU: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Quake, Steal Energy. // When one or more opposing characters takes damage from Moon Knight's attack, give him a Vengeance token.

Comments
February 13, 2022
SuperClixer
Nice dial. But my sculpt is not the same colors of the costume and logo in the photo, and the half moon logo is not painted yellow, like on the ASM Moon Knight, so I am disappointed in the paint job, and boring pose.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Anytime a figure can get +1 to ALL combat values its pretty nuts. Yeah he does have to hit or be hit to get the tokens but when he does he will swing for something nasty. Like all Moon Knights hes a bit of a mix of melee and range so sometimes you may not have the power you want showing on a dial depending on the situation. He's definitely a good fig though.
January 17, 2022
2 Gun Kid
Quake with 3 arrows? Giving him Flurry instead would've been more fitting. All he needs is a Prime where he's phoenix force, sorcerer supreme, iron fist and has Mjlonor orbiting around him. It was a crazy story and I need it
January 16, 2022
Buckwheat
Without a doubt, the best Moon Knight ever made (which isn't saying much). I would have preferred that his Trait included Toughness. Give him Defend on clicks 1-2, and cut out click #5. 3 lightning bolts would be easier to appreciate if he had Precision Strike or Incapacitate. I don't understand why Vengeance activates based on him getting hit, instead of other friendly characters. Apparently he's more keen on avenging injuries against himself than those that he promised to defend as the "Protector of Those Who Travel at Night."
January 16, 2022
KlaudyD
This will be My Definitive Heroclix MoonKnight
